summary: A transformer-based model class that leverages the MarkupLM architecture to perform sequence classification on documents containing markup languages (e.g., HTML, XML). It encapsulates the pretrained weights, configuration, and forward logic needed to produce class logits for downstream classification tasks.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use solution for businesses to classify and extract insights from markup-rich documents such as web pages, emails, or structured reports, enabling automated tagging, sentiment analysis, topic detection, or compliance checking.
